channel.title: RSCD V25 subs items and couple questions
channel.description:
i have look in all rsc topics to find out about how to edit on rscd v25 items and that items only for subs .... what file i must to edit ??? it is not same like easy rsc ... can any 1 help me ?
also : xp rate prayer rate it is same npc and item number like easy rsc ? how to make a client without run build .... ? start location death location starter items in bank ....
any help ? :)

item.title: RSCD V25 subs items and couple questions
item.dc:creator: @universallas universallas
item.description:
@universallas wrote:

kryptix so you thing is all this tut is same and all it work ? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425005.0.html do everything same ?but on this rscd v25 subd is going automaticly so how i can found it for xp and items if you help me now i am gona go out from this section and make a good tut for other ppl like me and relase my server it is only what i need now items fors subs and xp rate …
but in that easy rscd i am added manualy members how in rscd v25 do for subs ? cant found lines like ifsub … something like that … nothing about subs …

item.source: RSCD V25 subs items and couple questions

item.title: RSCD V25 subs items and couple questions
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

itemwieldbledef?:S (to change the power or armour etc).

Xp rate = player.java or formulae.java
Prayer rate = invactionhandler.java
Same npcs & item ids like easyrsc = yes.
Start location = rscd.sql (search after x or y).
Death location = player.java (search after died).
Starter items in bank = rscd.php in your www folder.

You mean make a client without the build.xml in it :S? heh just take it out?

btw its the first time i see so many diffrent posts from 1 user here on moparscape
and play around with the source, and you will find all the simple things you want to edit.

Read full topic
